locations.description:
The entrance is made up to look like the wide gaping mouth of a sinister looking clown,
but you'll be darned if you miss the one bit of excitement to come to your town in months

Through the entrance you come to an open area to your left is a fortune teller and to your right is the freak show, in front of you is a broken down gateway with a sign above it that says 'Zombie Zoo'
locations.hint: go left, right, forward, back or front gate

locations.description: The Fortune Tellers looks up from her cards./n'Hello! I've been waiting for you.'

actions.dollar: She takes your money and a mist begins to swirl from nowhere.'Someone is thinking about you' She says,'someone far away from here'
